string.text: To get the artifact.
To protect the Parking lot stalkers in the Junkyard from bandits
To protect the Parking lot stalkers in the Junkyard from bandits

To me there is a group of stalkers in the safe arrival of which I am interested personally. They stopped near the Bar. One repentant criminal element almost voluntarily informed us that they will soon attack. So head over there and defend their Parking area from attack.
On the Agroprom to help the stalkers fight off the bandits
On the Agroprom to help the stalkers fight off the bandits

In General, there is such a case. Recently, the agriculture group of stalkers is gone, the last time they the link out, said that in the subway, they got something valuable, but they are inhabited by gangbangers. While they hold, but the blame can not. Will help them?
To destroy the bandits in the Swamps
To kill a group of bandits in the Swamp. You need to do it quickly and thank.

Job, job of work... what do we have?.. Yeah! So, see: Caudle gang Bang in the Swamps? The "Debt", even though they yell about law and order a lot, all hands do not reach; however, these gangster scum rare, have all pulled out, so they walk long. Only those who get it first, cut down a few bucks... well, drink with me, that's for sure.
Destroy the mercenaries in the Forest.
To remove a group of mercenaries who are blocking passage through the Thicket.

Not far from here, in the Forest, sat down a group of mercenaries. You know - the misunderstanding is quickly it is necessary to decide. "Dolgovtsev" and with them some of the men experienced already gone to educate them only until something ago, they can not see... So did you... go check how things are there. Pay well.
To destroy the bandits on the farm
It's simple: clean the farm from bandits.

In the area of the dead marshes there is the farm. There was convenient to meet with someone it is necessary to take the goods is to pass, well, sort of... you know. And now there sat the bandits and dump in the near future, it seems, are not collected. Only I am not very happy. So I need to farm released in the near future. What will happen to the tenants - I don't care.
To clean up the refuge of the zombies in the Dead Marshes
To clean up the refuge of the zombies in the Dead Marshes
The Dead Marshes zombie Rob our couriers. We can't let those heathen wreak havoc. Need to clean up their camp.
Destroy the lair of the mutants in the Forest
Destroy the lair of the mutants in the Forest
Some of our guys went on an expedition, came back alone. The whole ragged, blood, eye glass. Ran into creatures of some. There's a whole herd. So, find their lair and kill every last one of them.
To destroy the lair of the Chimera in the Dead city
To destroy the lair of the Chimera in the Dead city
In the Dead City, in a pretty easy to rotate different deals place infested with Chimera. You know that such neighbors are not particularly bargain. So: need to clean up this place. Come from?
To destroy the lair of the Chimera in the Forgotten Forest
To destroy the librarian in the Forgotten Forest

My couriers are often used to delivery the Forgotten Forest. There has always been full of animals, but my couriers have successfully coped with them. However, more recently it became infested with the Chimera, and go through with merchandise is simply impossible. You need to eliminate those things. Will take?
Find the artifact "Hunk of meat"
To get the "Hunk of meat" - an artifact that helps to heal bodily ailments.

Here recently hypocrites some came in order to "Hunk of meat" left. You know, they have an interest in this artifact healing... the miracle worker rotten, damn it! Hmm, well... So you'll do it? In principle, do not force.
To find the artifact "Crystal thorn"
To find the artifact "Crystal thorn", which helps the carrier to protect themselves from attacks on the mind.

"Stinky"?.. No, not that. "Crystal waters"?.. No, not back then... Ugh! "Crystal thorn", on how! So, look: I ordered the artifact "Crystal thorn". Do you know this? Kind of like if you have it, so will not allow any creature to confuse your brain. Well, what do you say?
To find the artifact "Night star"
To find the artifact "Night star" - to help the national military science.
Need artifact "Night star". Desire, unfortunately, does not - checked, but to enrich it even can. Scientists good money for it give. Something, say, making on its basis the military... so what?
Find the artifact Flash
Find the artifact Flash
The task is easy and the pay is good. You need to find the artifact Flash. Don't even ask who and why ordered. Come from?
To find the artifact "goldfish"
To find the artifact "goldfish"

Bullseye, you know the tale about the goldfish? In, In! Still jokes a lot about her. Now, there is one man that everyone wants to catch her. In General, we need a unique artifact "goldfish", the customer is external, solid. Help?
To find a psi-suit
Find jumpsuit to effectively defend against telepathic attacks. You need to look somewhere in the abandoned labs of the Dark valley.

There was a time lab in the Dark valley worked: everyone was looking for, how to protect the brain from telepathic attacks. Only too slowly worked, So that seems to be one attempt was successful, and somewhere out there lies a girl, in which at least the controller to kiss... yeah, that's right. If you get me this thing will not forget.
Find rare revolver
Find the dressing room for a rare revolver
On-site dressing room I hid the gun one is cool. It would be necessary for him to drive. Will take?
Find automatic L85 "Stormtrooper"
Find automatic L85 "Stormtrooper". To look, apparently, you in the center of the Dead City.

So, this here story happened. Rushed one type is the pocket money directly toprada! The people his company to hire, which is not experienced, and pogonistes, gear packs to buy... I had a L85 automatic "Assault" is a miracle, and not a gun! - so I had foolishly sold him. The money is not lost, I will not lie... only the whole company was quickly covered somewhere. Well, sorry people, of course... except that now others will know: one salvage the road through the Area will not be lined. Yes, I still have a machine that is a pity - such a barrel, and rot! Find, huh? A good fee for me!
To bring the anomalous shotgun
Find in caves anomalous shotgun
The caves went one Stalker, which I have before that lent a shotgun, one modified. Had to return but has not returned. Need to find this Stalker and take his shotgun. Come from?
Find advanced machine gun
Find the advanced Radar gun

Monolith often use German machine guns MG-42. Where they are taking them is not clear. Can warehouse what is found, and may production was established. Told me that on the Radar stashed one Taco machine gun, and even with a telescopic sight. Imagine what this weapon is? It would be necessary to steal. There is a door with a combination lock. Code: 7472. The coordinates I'm thrown off.
To bring a modified shotgun
To bring a modified shotgun hidden in the Generators

A friend of my ex, well, that which the Monolith came, I borrowed a shotgun, modified for individual orders, but never gave. But then told me where he left it - on the Generators. The coordinates I'm thrown off.
To kill a soldier
It is necessary to kill the unknown soldier. The job seems fairly simple... only strange that the order on the person in the form, and the customer clearly very angry.
I need you to fix one military... and don't ask who he is, haha it gave me! Just make it happen. Well? It is possible to rely on you?
To kill a Stalker
To kill one of the stalkers. Death deceived - this is the revenge of the merchant.

You know, there are people that never anything bad to say... believe them, right? Rely on yourself... Just all of a sudden you find out that this some well is so cunning and deceitful son of a bitch that... well, there is a serious matter: it is necessary for all with one type to get even. Do, and the rest for me.
To kill a Stalker group "Monolith"
Found in the cave maze-a former friend of the bartender and help him to die.

Was once my friend... you believe this? Ah... but we are together in this Area came when all this here and still did not. And what we just did, to just not climb... Yes, they were young, reckless... Only it was never enough. It is to the center of the Zone wanted to go, and I pulled, and I refused - and rightly so, they refused... We pozabotilis then great, and he left... but I say, saw him there... he's behind the Monolith now stands. So you see here, Labeled... As the person asking find it, and... well, that he didn't suffer, after all, so I suppose... He's like a brother to me was, you know?
To kill a Stalker named Vampire
Find and kill the Stalker called Vampire.

All this type I got!.. I mean Vampire; you know him, no? Ooh, you bastard! He is from the people not the blood sucking, and good luck. Who no go - everything will be covered with one he is alive and well! Fifth time already! In short, the impure into something here. There is a large desire to put flowers on the grave of the Vampire... Well, you okay with this?
To kill a Stalker named Sparrow
Find Sparrow to avenge the death of another Stalker.

Nobles, damn it!.. Pushkin with Lermontov!.. And so, the boobies, under the anomalies and bullets go every day, and still duel in fashion took! Well, no, you just count up: we've got a dispute... no one remembers what this is about. Just decided these two idiot blood itself empty. Well, here you are: one gone... what the Stalker was! and the second is the Sparrow his name is quickly dumped, because I would he at the first event shot in the gut put. Find him. Sure, from the zone of he has not had time to get out. Doing?
To get the eyes of the "flesh"
To get the eyes of the "flesh"

Soon we have the feast will be a gala dinner, and some local foodies in a particularly good mood (not pointing any fingers) will want to try my signature dish - the eyes of the "flesh" under the pork sauce. That is, in it's own juice with mayonnaise on. In General, we need the eyes of this creature, and soon.
Bring the hoof of a boar
Bring the hoof of a boar

Know that we zagotovlen horns and hooves? This is now a rarity. Local mutated hooves make excellent decorations, I know a jeweler, he's interested. So go ahead, find the hoof of a boar, and your pocket money will arrive.
Bring the tail of the dog
Bring the tail of the dog
Soon will come the guests, which do not feed bread, just to eat dog tails. Would get a little rich.
Bring hand psevdogiganta
Bring hand psevdogiganta
Received an order from one foreign scientific organizations. They need a hand psevdogiganta for research. The pay is good.
To protect the Outpost of the Debt
To protect the Outpost of the Debt on the Landfill.

So, you probably met our guys at the Dump. They're something like the outer cordon, to protect the bar from mutants coming at you from the dark valley. Received information that a large pack of wild boars just closer to them. Help them to repulse the wave of mutants, I'll bring the Beers.
Destroy the zombies
Amber destroy zombie dolgovtsev.

We recently sent a group of amber is, unfortunately, no one in the group never returned. I was told that near the mobile lab at Yantar scientists saw several zombified stalkers from the group. We cannot allow them to remain in this terrible state. Your mission: find and destroy what they have become.
Eliminate a group of Freedom
To eliminate a group of Svoboda on Jupiter.

Of course, we do not charge job stranger stalkers. On the other hand, this task is simple, so the drive of our guys makes no sense. So, listen up. It is necessary to strip a small group of Svoboda on Jupiter. One of our group already there working, because in case of trouble has to retreat. Unable to start execution of the job.
Destroy the stalkers camp
Destroy the stalkers camp "Agriculture".

There is a delicate business, but our guys need to run to attract does not. Our allies disadvantageous to the presence of neutrals on the factory at "Agroprom". The problem is this: to liberate the industrial area from the presence of her Stalker, whoever they were and whatever groups belong to. All clear?
To destroy a squad of mercenaries
To destroy a squad of mercenaries to "Sprout".

So, the task here what: to destroy the detachment of snipers of the group of mercenaries. Fitment: these snipers hold the top floor of the building complex. Estimated number - at least two, no more than five. Armed, apparently, sniper rifles. Tip: day them not put.
Clean the base of bandits
To clean the main base of the bandits in the Dark valley.

Need to make a RAID on the main base of the bandits and destroy maximum number of enemy forces. It's in the Dark valley, where the unfinished science center. The number of The enemy about thirty fighters; armed with light automatic weapons, pistols, shotguns. All clear?
To clean up the camp of Freedom
To clean up the camp of Svoboda in Zaton.
This time we have to do the cleaning. In Zaton it is necessary to liquidate the camp particularly dangerous anarchists. All of them need to be harsh, but just punishment...
To destroy a swarm of flesh
To destroy a swarm of flesh on the "Dump".

We recorded the movement of a large flock of creatures... a Very ugly pig-like mutants, all of which is called the flesh. Now they are in the area of the landfill. We are all busy people, but these creatures need to destroy. Specific work, we will pay.
To destroy pseudocubic
To clean up the lair of pseudocubic near military depots.

Our allies reported the discovery of a den of monsters on the territory near the military warehouses. Presumably a flock of pseudocubic. We are now there to make noise to nothing, so it's the job for the neutral. Come from?
Destroy the Outpost mercenaries
In the Industrial zone to destroy the base of mercenaries.

Recently increased activity of mercenary groups that committed several attacks on scientists, explorers Zone. Unpunished is to not leave. You need to make a small punitive operation. The object - base of mercenaries on the territory of the Industrial zone.
Destroy the mercenaries on the "Wild territory"
Destroy the mercenaries on the "Wild territory".
A group of scientists plans to conduct research on the "Wild territory". But there the last time, insecure, intensified mercenaries. Make sure the mercenaries were not on the "Wild territory".
To kill Svoboda
To kill Svoboda, penetrated into Limansk.
I'll be brief. Svoboda bypassed our gates and are now in Limansk. They need to be addressed.
Destroy the controller
Destroy the controller at Yantar.
To perform this job, you must have special skills. Scientists told us that in the territory of Amber they had seen the controller. Controllers are very dangerous, but I'm sure you'll be fine.
Destroy Svoboda
Destroy Svoboda in the Red Forest.
In the Red Forest seen squad members. You need to destroy it. After you run you waiting for a special reward.
To destroy the bandits
To destroy the bandits at the Dump.

The operational environment is unfavorable, the bandits are concentrated in the area of the Landfill and the Dark valley. The best solution would be to simultaneously apply two pre-emptive strike! Valley will be engaged in our fighters, you will get a Dump.
To find a unique "Vintorez"
To find and bring unique "Vintorez"
I borrowed one Stalker called Ghost your Vintorez. Yes, the same epic Vintorez "Voronin". I killed the Stalker hero's death, but my rifle lying unattended somewhere... Need to find her.
Bring a flak jacket
To bring an army flak jacket new sample.

Someone from the military came the body armor of the new sample. Internal quilting these pieces is impregnated with some medicinal ointment, in General, shallow wounds heal as the dog. Recently, a dozen warriors near bullet-proof vests moved to the amber and got back his six feet, three on their shoulders. You know? One remained there. It is impossible to put down this bronezhelet fell into the hands of enemies.
Find the enhanced rifle
The cemetery equipment to find improved shotgun saiga-12.

Took the monolith captured my fighter in the cemetery equipment, and he has a shotgun, the saiga-12 was a very good fit for sniping. My soldier managed to escape from captivity, but the guns were to return could not, but gave the exact coordinates. Will take?
To neutralize the bandit
To neutralize the bandit Poker.

Nickname - the Poker. One of the most brutal leaders of the bandits, the scum and a rapist... his Head is clearly not right: say, in the Area of some rare disease has earned. Now he quite often there are complete lapses in memory, and when wakes up doesn't remember where he was and who. However, always armed and very aggressive. Ready for the task?
Find a weapon Dolgovtsa.
Member considers requests to find his weapon, he lost it somewhere in the Dead marshes, during the next outing.

Well it is necessary so screwed up. What this area does to the brain. Like strong nerves, never afraid of anything, and now this. All this howling in the ears. All went as usual. Was it across the dead marshes, and sat down with a Curve in ambush to cover the main group, and then I heard a howl, the horror gripped. Damn, I can't even remember was on the cordon. When returned to base, Voronin was nearly shot on the spot: he I-I just got the gun upgraded with a good service so to speak. And then... I panic like ran away, so obviously her there and left. If you could bring me, and where I am now without the normal weapons.
To clear out the Snork lair
Amber destroy the den Snork.

I want to offer you a small amount of money you will get if mink that lives in the marshes, cease to distract me and moss colleagues. Sometimes the experiments just don't get to focus, and our guard cats don't always cope with this task.
Destroy the lair of the Chimera
In "the Forest" clean up the lair of the Chimera.

In "the Forest" is the lair of the Chimera, I want You to go out and clean it. These mutants are dangerous for our expeditions. I know zoologists I do not support, but here, you see, not the zoo. These creatures carry rabies, plague and God knows what.
To bring the artifact "fireball"
To get research scientist artifact "fireball".

We managed to get the artifact in the laboratory! This is a breakthrough! Now on our progress will hear the whole world. And there's a Nobel prize in the offing! This is a unique artifact of Film, its main quality - protect from chemical burns. Want, I'll give the name of science? However, one request, in return I need the artifact "fireball", you know that? The unique thermal properties of its surface require detailed study.
Find artifact "Gravity"
To deliver the artifact "Gravity" in the hands of scientists.

We came close to understanding the nature of gravity, in fact, very soon we will be able to create a new generation of engines on the basis of anti-gravity, and, quite possibly, we will open the road to the stars. For this we need the artifact "Gravity", and fast.
To get the artifact "jellyfish"
The artifact "jellyfish" we need a scientist for research in the field of space-time.

Our research complex on the verge of discovering the secrets of space-time. The possibility of teleportation - this is not fiction! "Funnel" is an anomaly that shrinks the space, not just gravity acts on objects as I think some of my ossified opponents are theorists who sit in a warm NII, earnestly chewing chalk. Their glasses start to sweat, when they find out what can be achieved by science in the field! Get me the artifact "jellyfish", please.
Get the artifact "Moonlight"
To provide scientists at Yantar "Moonlight." A good artifact...

We need materials to continue research in the field of energy. You see, we learned how to generate electricity with the help of artifacts. However, while efficiency is not high enough. The best results we achieved with the artifact "Moonlight". Bring us a sample for further experiments.
Get the artifact "Sea urchin"
Scientists to improve of costumes desired artifact "Sea urchin".

You probably know that our costumes have the best protection from radiation. The secret is that we impregnate their essence from a special rare artifact. For the manufacture of the next batch of costumes we need this artifact, you call it "Sea urchin".
To bring a unique jumpsuit
To bring from an underground lab X16 unusual jumpsuit. The reward is a flamethrower.

We have business with You. We recently hired a Stalker to get inside the lab. Even then I noticed his costume, he significantly gave warmth. Stalker said that this suit wound he heals. In General, Stalker has not returned from the lab. No! You do not think, we have nothing to do with it! And the suit its still probably there. I would love to have had him for study. In return I'll give You I developed a flamethrower that is very effective against mutants.
To bring the scientific calculator
Find the scientific calculator Professor Sakharov.

I am no longer young and not used to these modern technologies. In particular, the prefer to perform calculations using a calculator. But here's the thing - during one of the expeditions into the Zone, I left his favorite scientific calculator, and now to send for him nobody. Take it, young man, bring me my favorite calculator?
To bring part of the body we
To get the fragment we in these places is not a problem.

We met with Semenov when I was lecturing in genetics at the University, and he was my student. So I became his supervisor. Then we just lifted the veil of secrecy modification of the genome. What am I doing? Oh yeah. For genetic studies we need samples of fresh muscle cells we. For genetic material You have to go to the swamp. There is a hypothesis that mink as a species - a new stage of human development. To be sure, we need a DNA test!
To get the claw of the Chimera
To bring the claw of the Chimera scientists. Hope will pay well hunting the Chimera is a dangerous business.
Hi, colleague! For our last experimetnal to develop heavy-duty materials, you need to get the claw of the Chimera. Will take? But be careful. This is a very dangerous chisik.
To get the eye of a poltergeist
To bring the eyes of the poltergeist scientist. But where to find these poltergeists?
Hi, colleague! I can't let You into all details, but it is extremely important to get the eyes of a poltergeist. Will take?
To produce the brush of the librarian
To bring the brush of the librarian. And I want to say: Now, fled. But money is a solid promise.

Good day! Some of my colleagues don't even believe in the existence of the mutants, I myself sometimes doubt it, but suddenly You're lucky. Need to get a part of the body of the librarian. Say found such a rare and very dangerous mutants in various secluded places. If successful I'm willing to pay serious money.
The destruction of The camp
To find the subject
To protect the stalkers at Agroprom
To repel the attack of bandits on the camp of stalkers.

There is a group of stalkers who live nearby. Normal guys understand that Area is a place of freedom that the laws here do not apply, and must live just right by his morals. And here they were now thinking whether to join us, Yes. We must help them fend off the bandits, huh? And we're snaryajenie throw.
To protect the barrier
To protect the barrier near army warehouses from the monsters.
Then again, monsters rod from the side of the burner. Help out the guys at the barrier to fight back. The award guaranteed.
To destroy a cluster of zombies
To destroy a cluster of zombies in Limansk.
Our detachments in Limansk are serious losses from different types of zombies, where there is lots lots. We need to help our children to clear the city from those infidels. Help?
Destroy the Outpost mercenaries
Destroy the Outpost mercenaries.

Listen. The point is that we should have dealt with the Outpost mercenaries. They could not touch, they can shoot good... but they oborzeli, they are quite beyond measure - climb into our territory, my people are trying to bribe. It's time to teach them a lesson. How do?
To destroy a group of "Debt"
Destroy the group of fighters of "Debt" to "Rostock".

How about a little hunt? "The Germ" showed up a squad of cleaners "Debt". There is a good chance that a surprise. "Debt" constantly sends their children for monsters to run, well, under the guise to kill anyone who they do not like. It is necessary to destroy this group, and soon "the Debt" finally "Rostock" hook. The people there should be not much: three or four of the veteran plus a couple of newcomers.
Destroy the Outpost "Duty"
Destroy the Outpost "Duty" on the Moor.

There's a little something urgent. Need to clear the passage of the detachment of "Debt"... We are expecting a very important delivery, but now we can not exclude that "the Debt" about our courier already knows and attempt to intercept the cargo. It should be the hindrance of to screw it up, at least temporarily. Huh?
To destroy the Outpost "Duty"
To destroy the Outpost "Duty" at the Dump.

There's a little something urgent. Need to clear the passage of the detachment of "Debt"... We are expecting a very important delivery, but now we can not exclude that "the Debt" about our courier already knows and attempt to intercept the cargo. It should be the hindrance of to screw it up, at least temporarily. Huh?
To destroy a pack of wild boars
To destroy a pack of wild boars in the Forgotten Forest.
From the Forgotten Forest constantly rod hordes of wild boars and they're all really zadolbal. The task is simply to kill all these creatures to edrene hair dryer. Do?
Destroy the gate Monolith
In Limansk to destroy the gate Monolith.
Monolith In Limansk constantly shelled our outposts. We are serious losses. We need someone who can this thing somehow correct. Go?
Destroy the detachment of "Debt"
In Zaton the destroy squad "Duty."
In Zaton dolgovtsev absolutely brutalized. We need someone who will be able to calm them. Go?
To steal a sniper rifle
To steal from a warehouse on the basis of "Debt" modified Svdm 2.

There is a special task. Not easy, by the way... well, let's get driven "sniper" warehouse "dolgovtsev". This screw even name some its there, but not that important. Most importantly, that fucking optics and recoil compensator to help over four hundred meters of the protein in the eye planting. Well, I'm looking at you!
To obtain the modified Chaser 13
To get the modified Chaser 13 scientists.

I hear the eggheads have managed to finalize a great shot Winchester with the help of some artifact. Knockdown now this thing has that howitzer. In General, go to them - maybe we can bargain? All expenses compensated!
Find a rare assault rifle
Near the military warehouses to get a rare example of an assault rifle M-16.
I collect rare weapons. Recently seen at the mercenaries modification rare assault rifles M-16. You know, I want to get it. I am interested in this gun. Thanks will be adequate, no doubt.
To kill the head of security for "the Debt"
To kill the head of security for "the Debt", trying to do it as quietly.

It would be nice to the security chief of "Debt" quietly disappeared. Then they'll have a small mess that I can introduce a few guys in their group. And then, what the hell... okay, I won't roll lips ahead of time. Suggest to run the client from a distance and quietly without making a fuss.
To kill captain Ivantsov
To kill a close aide of the leader of "Debt" - captain Ivantsov.

The job is difficult, I warn you once, but it's worth it. We need to punish Ivantsova, a henchman of the commander of this "Debt". Does the dirtiest work: punitive expeditions, raids... if you only Knew how many of our guys he hung! It is time for this stuff to understand completely. If you decide to, I suggest you first have a good arm.
Kill Colonel Petrenko
Kill Colonel Petrenko - one of the founding fathers of the group "Duty".

Colonel Petrenko... I don't know if you heard this name, met with him or not, but it would be good to meet you. This man is one of the founders of "Debt" and one of the worst of our enemies. Make sure that your conversation ended quickly... for him. Pull?
To destroy the traitor
Search and destroy Svoboda traitor.
One of our such a thing thrown out, and went over to the mercenaries, and before that apparently spied on them. And this is simply impossible. Taking the case? Pay, don't worry.
To kill one of the commanders of "Debt"
To kill one of the commanders of "Debt".
Crying for the head of any of the heads of "Debt"! Flood - back for a reward.
To kill a Stalker called Scarecrow
To kill a Stalker called Scarecrow.

We destroy the monster, only for us it is a matter of survival, not profit. Populations of mutants are not so numerous; besides, it is also living beings, so we are unable to prevent their complete destruction. Some individuals do not understand. A good example: there is one Stalker, they call Scarecrow. He his nickname was not just, but because pricked rivet for sale stuffed from these poor fellows. We warned him, but to no avail. Do a good deed for mother Earth?
To kill a Stalker named Master.
To kill a Stalker named Master chief quartermaster group "the Debt."

A CAD, a sycophant, a hypocrite, a coward... he is a Master Stalker. As you can see, people remarkable mental qualities that helped him to climb into the upper echelons of "Debt". Now is providing the group with supplies and food, although from time to time still involved in the raids. Need to get rid of it - especially since almost all links of "Debt" in the sense of the supply is tied to his Master.
To bring a paw psevdogiganta
To bring a paw psevdogiganta.
We've got a celebratory dinner planned in honor of the birthday of Bob Marley. You, brother, give us his paw psevdogiganta tastier, huh? Or better two! Jah will not forget!..
Destroy the lair of the controllers.
The hunter asks to clean up the lair of the supervisors on the Farm, promises a rare artifact.

Controller You met? The horror, right? And I'm just now went to the Farm, thought to hold artifacts. And imagine - see the controller. Sitting over the corpse, he sees me. I got scared and gave out a tear... Nothing I ran, and he heard me and come with me, and once such a howl rose around... then I realized that he was not alone. I think the lair they have there. If you could drive them out of there, I would have gave you one rare artifact that a couple of days ago found.
To kill a Stalker.
To extract the body part of the monster
Destroy the Stalker Freedom.
One Stalker, a former member considers who knew a lot of information on important sites on the river, recently defected to Freedom, you need to kill him, until he talked too much.

Listen here. We have a map of Pripyat, not modern, but old, military, made in the early nineties. The most important thing for them is to refer to all military facilities: underground warehouses, bomb shelters. Now this good enough of course, but if suddenly we find the way to Pripyat - this information will be invaluable. Here is the problem. One of the officers over to Freedom, and he knew about this information. In General, it is necessary to destroy it, until a mouth.
Return for a reward.
To bring the customer promise.
Now have nothing to offer.
And what do you want to talk about?
Well done, you deserve a reward!
What is it?
Look what you now have:
Look what you now have:

Thus, they not only see with their eyes, but also smell them! We are preparing for transplantation of the miracle of the eyes of one of... of our research assistants-volunteers. Get a boar's leg

Greetings... uh-uh... stranger! Glad you decided to visit us: we just needed people to participate in a very important experiment. Zhupikov colleague wants to try to make a meal out of the local fauna for hands-on experiment to study the influence of mutated protein on the human body. While we have chosen to focus on the boars. We need ham. Leg of wild boar. I hope at least you understand? If you take up this case, please choose the more well-fed individual.
Find the tail of the wolf

Hello my colleague! We still can't unravel the mechanism observed in wolves amazing properties, so I decided to change the vector of our research. At this time we will start from the end... Why are you smiling? What are you so... Oh Yes. I think I understand. You see, always giggling young people, we need tail of this creature at the end... Yes, at the end of the body.
